channel.title: I need help on uploading my client folder
channel.description: hey i dont know what to keep in my client folder before makeing it to a zip file and uploading it. i got all the run.bat and the compiler in my client. should i remove that so i can upload the rest or what should i keep in it?

item.title: I need help on uploading my client folder
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

can somebody help me out with this problem about making a client exactly only for the people who want to play on this server and also keep my own with compiler please…
i have a teamviewer or some other stuff if someone could help me thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help on uploading my client folder

item.title: I need help on uploading my client folder
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

joelx617:

how do i take off the .java files so no one can make changes and also how do i make a separate folder with all that so they have a similar client folder but not as same as i should have since i server owner.

Compile and leave .class files.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help on uploading my client folder
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

joelx617:

should i delete the compiler for the client before uploading? cuz i dont see other people with compilers in the file?

Without the .java files they can’t compile anyway so it doesn’t matter.

item.title: I need help on uploading my client folder
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

run moneygod:

urm tbh u need 2 remove like urm well keep cache put most in cache folder like download some 1ns client and just see what they done but yea cache is most space anyway just look at some 1 elses client

English: You should delete all the Java files (Leave the class files.), other then that, just leave everything in it.
